Class EventTypeMatcher

java.lang.Object
org.microbean.assign.AbstractTypeMatcher
org.microbean.event.EventTypeMatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constable, BiPredicate<TypeMirror, TypeMirror>, Matcher<TypeMirror, TypeMirror>
public final class EventTypeMatcher extends AbstractTypeMatcher
An AbstractTypeMatcher encapsulating CDI-compatible event type matching rules.
Author:
Laird Nelson
See Also:
  • test(TypeMirror, TypeMirror)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    final boolean
    test(TypeMirror receiver, TypeMirror payload)
    Returns true if and only if the supplied payload argument (normally an event type) matches the supplied receiver argument (normally an observed event type), according to the rules defined by section 2.8.3 of the CDI specification.

  • Method Details

    • test

      public final boolean test(TypeMirror receiver, TypeMirror payload)
      Returns true if and only if the supplied payload argument (normally an event type) matches the supplied receiver argument (normally an observed event type), according to the rules defined by section 2.8.3 of the CDI specification.
      Parameters:
      receiver - the left hand side of an event type assignment (normally an observed event type); must not be null
      payload - the right hand side of an event type assignment (normally an event type); must not be null
      Returns:
      true if and only if the supplied payload argument matches the supplied receiver argument, according to the rules defined by section 2.8.3 of the CDI specification; false otherwise
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if either argument is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if either type is any type other than an array type, a primitive type, or a declared type
